servinfo.title: Registration of the Ignition Key
servinfo.ptxt: To finish the registration of the ignition key, the transponder code memorized in the transponder built in the ignition key has to be registered with ICM. To register the transponder code with ICM, perform “Register Ig Key” mode of SUZUKI scan tool referring to “SUZUKI Tech 2 Operator’s Manual”.

item.ptxt: A maximum of four transponder codes can be registered with ICM.

At an early part of the registration process, all transponder codes of the ignition keys in use already registered with ICM are cleared. Therefore, before starting the registration, prepare all ignition keys in use in addition to the new ignition key(s) to be registered with ICM.
